pages.title: Wooden Axe
pages.text: The tech-tree in TerraFirmaCraft is a complete overhaul of the vanilla progression system. There are no such thing as wooden tools in TerraFirmaCraft, with your first tools being made of stone.

pages.title: Stone Axe
pages.text: This means that you should not waste your time punching trees, as doing so will take a very long time to break the block, and will give you absolutely nothing in return.
